response.overview: Rick Teepen is a skilled reptile enthusiast.  He has been presenting educational programs about reptiles in classrooms and churches throughout the midwest for two decades.  In recent years, Rick has put a Christ-centered focus on his presentations and presents programs at the Creation Museum in Northern Kentucky on a regular basis.  Rick has combined his experience with reptiles, and his passion for spreading the good news about Jesus, into a unique, fascinating program that connects his audience with the wonders of God through live reptiles and biblical facts.  This video highlights key biblical references from a typical Snakes Alive program, and presents them in episodes that can be used in classrooms or biblical studies.  Each episode is between 2 to 5 minutes long and includes bonus materials.  You can use each episode as an introduction to a message or to underscore a particular point on a related theme.
response.title: Snakes Alive with Rick Teepen
